title: Search Advertising Account
description: Search Advertising Account Class includes fields that defines Account Entity on Search Advertising Platform.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: External Account ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: External Account ID on the search advertising platform.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Search Engine ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Internal Identifier that determines which search advertising platform the data is pulled from.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Search Advertising Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Defines Name of the Search Advertising Platform for the Campaign.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Currency the account operates on the advertising platform
Account Status
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Managed Flag indicates whether account is enabled or disabled on search networks.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Creation Time of the Campaign in Adobe Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Creation Time in UTC when Campaign got created in Adobe Platform.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Modified Time of the Campaign in Adobe Platform
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Modified Time in UTC when Campaign got modified in Adobe Platform.
